php.LBL_MAX_TEXT_LENGTH_IN_LISTVIEW: Maximum text length in List View
php.LBL_MAX_ENTRIES_PER_PAGE_IN_LISTVIEW: Maximum entries per page in List View
php.LBL_TITLE_MAX_LENGTH: Maximum length of characters for title
php.LBL_LIST_MAX_ENTRIES_MASSEDIT: Maximum number of records in mass edition
php.LBL_BG_CLOSING_MODAL: Enable closing of modal window by clicking on the background
php.LBL_SHOW_LANG_IN_LOGIN_PAGE: Show language selection on the login page
php.LBL_SHOW_LAYOUT_IN_LOGIN_PAGE: Show layout selection on the login page
php.LBL_CONFIG_EDITOR_DESCRIPTION: Update configuration file of the application
php.LBL_RELATION_COMMENT_MAX_LENGTH: Maximum length of a comment visible on the related record
php.LBL_RELATION_COMMENT_MAX_LENGTH_DESC: These fields are available in some relations, e.g. in the Products & services tab in Account module
php.LBL_RELATION_SHOW_RELATED_MODULE_NAME: Show related modules names in tabs
php.LBL_RELATION_SHOW_RELATED_ICON: Show related modules icon in tabs
php.LBL_RELATION_SHOW_RECORDS_COUNT: Show record count in tabs of related modules
php.LBL_RELATION_SEPARATE_CHANGE_RELATION_BU: Separate action buttons for changing additional data
The button defines a special data type that belongs only to relations, available e.g. in the Occurrences module

js.JS_PLEASE_ENTER_NUMBER_IN_RANGE_1TO100: Please enter value in the range 1-100
